summary: Housecarls wear clothes and sandbox at home. Fighting styles differ between housecarls, weapons are leveled, and all have stealth perks. Faces and hairstyles changed, but remain vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]There are many housecarl mods available. I just want one that's close to original without hair-spray, sexy garments...just a bit better than vanilla.

[color=orange]HOUSECARLS[/color] will...
-- Have their own fighting styles and armor types
-- Wear clothes at home and armor when outside in follower-mode
-- Have stealth perks that keep them from triggering pressure plates and keep them silent
-- Know basic healing spells
-- Carry leveled weapons and arrows
-- Carry a hold-specific shield (guard type)
-- Carry a torch at night
-- Sleep from 12 to 8pm
-- Have had cosmetic changes made, but use vanilla hair-styles
-- Dawnguard version replaces housecarl bow with a leveled crossbow.

[color=orange]LYDIA[/color]: Dual-wielding fighter. Armor type: Leather and steel-plate
[color=orange]IONA[/color]: Bosmer archer. Armor type: leather
[color=orange]CALDER[/color]: 1-handed fighter. Armor type: Mixed steel and iron
[color=orange]JORDIS[/color]: 1-handed fighter. Armor type: steel plate
[color=orange]ARGIS[/color]: 2-handed fighter. Armor type: steel plate

[color=orange]INSTALLATION[/color]: If you have Dawnguard, and want housecarls to use crossbows, install version #2.

[color=orange]CONFLICTS:[/color] This mod edits the appearance and behavior of 5 standard-game housecarls, and is therefore incompatible with other mods that edits their appearance. "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4806/]Respectful Lydia[/url]" mod should be placed above this mod in your load order. The same goes for using "Amorous Adventures".

[color=orange]TROUBLESHOOTING[/color]:
[i]"FACES are gray/haven't changed."[/i]
-- Please use LOOT to put this mod at or near the bottom of your load order.
-- Did you put the meshes/textures folders in your data folder?

[i]"So-in-so won't follow/stop following me." [/i]This mod only changes the actor's appearance and inventory. The following mechanic is affected by mods like UFO/EFF/AFT.[/size]
author: Qaxe Qaixaci
